title: Accelerated Times
description: Imagine you wake up one day to find 99% of the world's population has disappeared - and then 99% again the morning after that. Phones and internet down, highways destroyed, a government that isn't exactly forthcoming with answers...how would YOU go about figuring out what became of friends and family? These questions and more are addressed in this chilling new novel from Jason McGathey, where protagonists confront this nightmarish scenario in an all too believable near future.
author: Jason McGathey
